You fall asleep amongst your thoughts.
column15: You open some preserved pumpkin and begin to eat it. The cat meows at you. It must be hungry too. You place some pumpkin on the ground for it to eat. It makes delightful eating noises. You get back to eating and suddenly you hear some shuffling coming from somewhere... beneath you?
column16: You run back and head down the middle passage. Your lantern is starting to go flicker in and out. You reach a huge room that has a heavy air to it. You are filled with dread. As you walk further into the room a deep voice bellows, "We've been waiting for you"
column17: You approach a sign that says the road exit to Clayton is up ahead. You're pace picks up as you steady closer to the exit ramp.
